modName: Fabulous Followers - Standalone Bosmer Girls - NO Other Mods Reqd
summary: Adds 5 Wood Elf followers to the game, as followers and marriable NPC's. They come with custom meshes, skin textures, eye, and hair - no other mod is required for their appearance, and they'll affect no other NPC's.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod's page.

My custom work will continue as planned.

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don't know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I'll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]

**Please note that unlike my other follower sets, you won't find a UNPB/CBBE/ADEC patch, a nonessential patch, or individual downloads at this time, they only come in a group and with UNP for now. This is because I'm very busy working on Fabulous Followers 2.0 which is a complete edition of all my followers with (hopefully) a scripted NMM installer to let you choose the aforementioned options. I didn't want you all to have to wait another 2 weeks for these girls when they were otherwise done, so I'm sorry for the lack of options in this initial release!**

[center][/center]

[b] Please note you should not need any other mods for the girls to look as the do in screenshots, and it will not conflict with any body/face mods you have in place. They should look exactly as they do in the screenshots, minus the armor, which you can find a link to at the bottom of this description![/b]

This mod introduces 5 NPC's, each with their own set of body meshes and textures, in order to give them a great look without having to go through the process of installing other mods. The NPCs are female Wood Elves, and are designed to be followers, but you can also marry them.

Thank you to the always wonderful hodilton for the video! If you haven't subscribed to his channel I suggest you check it out!
[youtube]aImhEFARI30[/youtube]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/dpCsV.png[/img]

[size=3][b]All Girls:[/b][/size]
[list] [*]are marked Essential[*]are Marriable [*]Auto-Level with Player [*]can be found at The Silver-Blood Inn in Markarth[*]have different voices so travelling with all 5 is not confusing[*]have different combat classes so you're sure to find a follower that suits your style. [/list]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/KhsGL.png[/img]
[b]I highly recommend using a mod manager, especially NMM, to install this mod. There will be updates, and it's a lot easier to uninstall if you have problems this way.[/b]

NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download with Manager" button under the only file there.
After the mod is downloaded with NMM, activate it and load up your game. It shouldn't make too much difference where in your load order you put it.

Non-NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download Manually" under the only file there
After the mod is downloaded, unzip the 'Data" folder in the archive to your Skyrim directory. There shouldn't be any overwritten files but it will ask you to merge folders. Click "yes"

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eH4Wl.png[/img]
NMM:
Deactivate and delete the mod in NMM. Simple!

Non NMM:
Deactivate "ffbosmer.esp" in your skyrim data options
In "Data" under your skyrim directory, delete the following files and folders:
FFBosmer.esp
meshes/00ffdillyn
meshes/00ffkiri
meshes/00ffmaeci
meshes/00ffpepper
meshes/00ffsaeya
meshes/00ffbosmershared
facegendata/facegeom/ffbosmer.esp
textures/00ffdillyn
textures/00ffkiri
textures/00ffmaeci
textures/00ffpepper
textures/00ffsaeya
textures/00ffbosmershared
textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Ffbosmer.esp

[img]http://i.imgur.com/65ZxN.png[/img]

Also check under the "Permissions and Credits" button!

These mods are out of this world, please check them out if you like these girls!

Special Thanks: Bethesda, The Nexus site admins, Basskim and Grospolina

Tools Used: Creation Kit, NPC Editor, Photoshop, NifSkope, DXTBmp
Mods Used: Puppeteer, Pinup Poser, FNIS
